DOC.brief_summary: This research study test clinical outcome Trabecular Metal™ Dental Implants ( TMDI ) ( Zimmer Dental Inc Carlsbad , CA , US ) Maxillary Sinus region . This project enroll 30 active subject receive two dental implant edentulous maxillary molar region . This 24-month research study examine clinical stability TMDI sinus elevation sinus augmentation environment . The propose research lay foundation improve health care provide surgeon restorative dentist data determine effect TMDI clinical success less optimal osseous environment . The rationale underlies investigation identification influence trabecular surface design implant stability vary bone type allow routine , predictable use early loading , , turn , translate rapid , economical health care , improve psychosocial well-being patient . If hypothesis correct , result expect provide evidence base research data support early loading immediate loading single implant sit adequate bone volume , density without use graft material sinus lift procedure . In addition , expect result fundamentally advance field implant dentistry bioengineering provide information principle bone density-mechanical environment-implant stability interaction .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Conventional Dental Implants Trabecular Metal™ Dental Implants After Sinus Floor Elevation
DOC.detailed_description: Specific Aims Primary Outcome Measures : • The objective study allow preliminary analysis resonance frequency value 12 month period , primary outcome Secondary Outcome Measures : • To assess bone maturation , crestal bone level maintenance , implant survival two year Study Arms Bone Augmentation : Placement two dental implant Sinus augment Puros Cortico-Cancellous Particulate Allograft ( 70 % Cortico 30 % Cancelleous ) ( Zimmer Dental- Carlsbad , CA , USA ) - one implant TMDI ( Zimmer Dental- Carlsbad , CA , USA ) second Tapered Screw-Vent TSV-MTX ( Zimmer Dental- Carlsbad , CA , USA ) . Implant stability determine initial insertion torque RFV value time implant placement 1 month heal monthly basis 12 month post implant placement . Thickness bone surround implant body position sinus measure . Sinus Elevation : Placement two dental implant mention sinus augment sinus elevation procedure , blood clot CopiOs Pericardium Membrane ( Zimmer Dental- Carlsbad , CA , USA ) . One implant TMDI ( Zimmer Dental- Carlsbad , CA , USA ) second Tapered Screw-Vent TSV-MTX ( Zimmer Dental- Carlsbad , CA , USA ) . Implant stability determine insertion torque RFV value time implant placement 1 month heal monthly basis 12 month post implant placement . Thickness bone surround implant body position sinus measure .
DOC.criteria: • The subject male female 2175 year age : The ability understand sign inform consent prior start study The ability willingness comply study requirement Adequate oral hygiene The presence atrophic , pneumatized , partially edentulous maxilla require lateral approach technique Adequate bone volume accommodate plan endosseous dental implant ( e.g . sufficient height bone ( 5 mm great ) implant would achieve primary stability , sufficient width implant could place within confines exist bone without dehiscence fenestration . The implant length utilize protocol 10 mm long TMDI ( Zimmer ) Existing teeth healthy adequately restore , desire fix restoration implant negative pregnancy test within one week prior surgery , childbearing potential . Subjects smoke cigarette chew tobacco within past year History alcoholism drug abuse within past 5 year Subjects Severe bruxing clench habit Untreated periodontitis Subjects undue risk outpatient surgical procedure Subjects presence residual root implant site Subjects history site development ( extensive bone augmentation ) implant site past 4 month Placement implant extraction site heal less 2 month Presence local inflammation mucosal diseases lichen planus Subjects uncontrolled diabetes ( define HA1c > 7.0 percent ) Subjects current hematologic disorder chronic use Coumadin ( similar ) anticoagulant therapy Subjects history leukocyte dysfunction deficiency Subjects Metabolic bone disorder Subjects history renal failure Subjects history liver disease Immunocompromised Subjects HIV , RA , SLE collagen vascular disorder Subjects chronic corticosteroid use Subjects undergoing chemotherapy Subjects history use IVbased bisphosphonates Subjects history radiation treatment head neck Subjects require graft bone mucosal tissue time implant placement , would require submersion implant healing period Subjects use investigational drug device within 30 day period immediately prior implant surgery Pregnant woman woman intend become pregnant study period . Subjects require submersion implant esthetic reason
